mapper.sql: bind_id AS "bindId", inkind_id AS "inkindId", detail_id AS "detailId", anomaly_id AS "anomalyId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_anomaly_bind where 1 = 1
and bind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.bindId},'%')
and inkind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inkindId},'%')
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and anomaly_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.anomalyId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
